content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Iron Plate Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace entity employed to smelt iron ore into iron plates for advanced crafting processes.

### Copper Plate Production Structure at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of:
– A copper furnace entity used to convert copper ore into copper plates for producing components such as cables and circuits.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Usage with get_entities  
 – When calling get_entities, avoid unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. use of “radius”) or extra positional arguments if the function does not accept them. Always refer to the supported signature before invocation.

• Inventory and Entity Handling for Lab Placement  
 – Ensure that required items (such as a Lab) are present in the inventory before attempting to place them.  
 – When retrieving entities (e.g. labs), validate that the returned value is iterable to avoid errors from None-type values.

• Resource Shortage in Advanced Crafting  
 – Confirm that all prerequisite resources and sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are sufficiently available before initiating high-level crafting (e.g. Lab production).
